en: I'm a Data & AI lead with a passion for creating practical, AI-powered cloud-based products that blend low-code and pro-code approaches.

At PwC Portugal, I lead the design and implementation of Smart Products, Automation and AI integration, including Agentic AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Conversational AI/Chatbots. I am a certified Azure and Power Platform solution architect, holding 13 Microsoft certifications across multiple services. My technical background covers a wide range, including Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, and more. I use these skills to develop scalable AI products and automate workflows that make work easier and more efficient.

Beyond my professional work, I love learning. I have a Master's in Economics and Management of Science, Technology, and Innovation, and a diverse set of interests—from philosophy and history to design, photography, and astronomy. I started a Portuguese-language podcast to share insights and dive into new areas of knowledge.
pt: Sou líder de Data & IA com paixão por criar produtos cloud práticos com IA que combinam abordagens low-code e pro-code.

Na PwC Portugal, lidero o design e implementação de Produtos Inteligentes, Automação e integração de IA, incluindo IA Agêntica, Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e IA Conversacional/Chatbots. Sou arquiteto de soluções certificado em Azure e Power Platform, com 13 certificações Microsoft em vários serviços. Minha formação técnica abrange várias áreas, incluindo Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, e mais. Uso essas competências para desenvolver produtos de IA escaláveis e automatizar fluxos de trabalho que tornam o trabalho mais fácil e eficiente.

Além do meu trabalho profissional, adoro aprender. Tenho um Mestrado em Economia e Gestão da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação, e um conjunto diversificado de interesses—desde filosofia e história até design, fotografia e astronomia. Iniciei um podcast em português para partilhar conhecimentos e explorar novas áreas de conhecimento.

en.title: Product and Cloud Lead - Data & AI team
en.description: Since January 2024, I have been at the helm of managing, designing, and implementing AI-focused, cloud-based solutions, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and integration of Large Language Models (LLMs), as a leader within PwC Portugal's Data & AI team. Our aim is to deliver top-tier AI-powered products, striking a balance between pro-code and low-code methodologies, and leveraging cloud-based deployment for scalability. I lead a team of experts, setting architectural standards and leading the orchestration of AI automation workflows. My proficiency in Microsoft Azure and Power Platform is crucial for advancing these solutions from concept to worldwide implementation.

pt.title: Responsável de Produto e Cloud - Equipa de Data & IA
pt.description: Desde janeiro de 2024, tenho estado à frente da gestão, design e implementação de soluções baseadas em cloud focadas em IA, incluindo Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e integração de Grandes Modelos de Linguagem (LLMs), como líder dentro da equipa de Data & IA da PwC Portugal. O nosso objetivo é fornecer produtos de IA de alto nível, equilibrando metodologias pro-code e low-code, e aproveitando a implementação baseada em cloud para escalabilidade. Lidero uma equipa de especialistas, estabelecendo padrões arquitetónicos e liderando a orquestração de fluxos de trabalho de automação de IA. A minha proficiência em Microsoft Azure e Power Platform é crucial para avançar estas soluções do conceito à implementação mundial.

en.title: Cloud and Business Apps Lead - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As the Cloud and Business Apps Consulting Lead, I design cutting-edge cloud architectures, having contributed to over 90 opportunities for global partners and clients. I manage a team of specialized technical consultants within a Consulting Solutions team of about 80 professionals.

pt.title: Responsável de Cloud e Apps de Negócio - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como Responsável de Consultoria em Cloud e Apps de Negócio, desenho arquiteturas cloud de ponta, tendo contribuído para mais de 90 oportunidades para parceiros e clientes globais. Giro uma equipa de consultores técnicos especializados dentro de uma equipa de Soluções de Consultoria de cerca de 80 profissionais.

en.title: Specialist - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As a Microsoft Power Platform specialist, I utilize the full suite of Power Platform tools, from Canvas Apps and Power BI reports to Power Portals/Pages and Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). I integrated these solutions with Azure (e.g., Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (e.g Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse, and SharePoint services. In addition to this expertise, I've successfully led full-stack pro-code app development projects, overseeing them from concept to delivery. Notably, I also earned PwC Portugal's first ever Hackathon as the team leader and technical specialist. This initiative has evolved into a product that we are now beginning to sell worldwide.

pt.title: Especialista - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como especialista em Microsoft Power Platform, utilizo o conjunto completo de ferramentas Power Platform, desde Canvas Apps e relatórios Power BI até Power Portals/Pages e Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). Integrei estas soluções com Azure (por exemplo, Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (por exemplo, Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse e serviços SharePoint. Além desta experiência, liderei com sucesso projetos de desenvolvimento de aplicações pro-code full-stack, supervisionando-os desde o conceito até à entrega. Notavelmente, também ganhei o primeiro Hackathon da PwC Portugal como líder de equipa e especialista técnico. Esta iniciativa evoluiu para um produto que estamos agora a começar a vender mundialmente.

en.title: The Career Exploration Years
en.description: Survived a whirlwind tour through Portugal's service economy - from cold-calling as a telemarketer (REDITUS), folding clothes with surgical precision (ZARA), explaining why wasabi isn't guacamole (Yo! Sushi), and selling suspiciously overpriced hot dogs. Worked in a university call center answering frantic students' questions about campus locations, created marketing materials nobody read at Le Wagon, and participated in organizing festivals and publicity campaigns for Sagres. A character-building odyssey that taught me patience, resilience, and how to smile while a tourist explains that in Portugal it's called a 'galão' not a 'meia de leite'.

pt.title: Os Anos de Exploração de Carreira
pt.company: Vários Papéis em Retalho, Marketing e Academia
pt.description: Sobrevivi a uma tour pela economia de serviços de Portugal - desde fazer chamadas a frio como telemarketer (REDITUS), dobrar roupa com precisão cirúrgica (ZARA), explicar porque wasabi não é guacamole (Yo! Sushi), e vender cachorros quentes suspeitosamente caros. Atendi no call center respondendo a estudantes onde ficava o ISEG ou o IADE, criei materiais de marketing que ninguém leu no Le Wagon, e participei na organização de festivais e campanhas publicitárias para a Sagres. Uma odisseia de construção de carácter que me ensinou paciência, resiliência, e como sorrir enquanto um turista cliente explica-me agressivamente que em Portugal se diz galão e não meia de leite.

skillDescriptions.Low-code Development: I create powerful business apps with minimal coding, empowering non-developers to build what they need. Think of it as Lego for software - connecting pre-built blocks to solve real problems without diving into complex code.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Computing: I build systems that live and breathe in the cloud, scaling from handling a handful of users to millions without breaking a sweat. It's like having an infinitely expandable digital workshop that's always on.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Azure: My digital playground where I've built everything from AI-powered chatbots to automated data pipelines. Azure is my trusted toolkit for creating solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing systems.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Power Platform: My Swiss Army knife for business problems - I've used it to create apps that saved teams thousands of hours of manual work and automated processes that were once spreadsheet nightmares.
skillDescriptions.Power BI: I transform mountains of raw data into visual stories that reveal the hidden patterns. I've built dashboards that helped leaders make million-dollar decisions with confidence instead of guesswork.
skillDescriptions.Power Automate: I've automated countless tedious tasks with this tool - from simple approval workflows to complex multi-system processes that previously required armies of people copy-pasting between systems.
skillDescriptions.Data Science: I dig through data to uncover insights others miss. Like a detective following clues, I use statistical methods and algorithms to solve business mysteries and reveal actionable patterns.
skillDescriptions.Azure AI Services: I bring intelligent capabilities to applications without reinventing the wheel. I've used these services to create apps that can see, hear, speak, and understand human needs.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Architecture: I design digital ecosystems that connect various services into cohesive, resilient systems. It's like being an urban planner for cloud cities, ensuring everything works together harmoniously.
skillDescriptions.Dynamics 365: I've customized and extended these business apps to streamline operations across sales, service, and marketing teams, creating unified experiences that eliminate departmental silos.
skillDescriptions.Databricks: My preferred environment for tackling massive datasets. I've used it to process terabytes of data and train machine learning models that would crash lesser systems.
skillDescriptions.RAG: I enhance AI responses by connecting them to specific knowledge bases. I've built systems that can answer questions by pulling relevant information from thousands of documents, policies, and records.
skillDescriptions.LLM Integration: I weave large language models into applications to make them more intuitive and helpful. I've created solutions that understand natural language requests and generate human-quality content.
skillDescriptions.Python: My go-to programming language for data analysis and automation. I've written scripts that processed millions of records and built web apps that serve thousands of users.
skillDescriptions.C#/.NET: My trusted toolset for building rock-solid applications. I've developed everything from internal tools to customer-facing platforms that handle critical business operations.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft PowerPoint: I craft presentations that actually engage audiences and convey complex ideas simply. My slides tell stories that stick, not just bullet points that bore.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Excel: Beyond basic spreadsheets, I build analytical tools and models that provide real business intelligence. I've created forecasting models that predict outcomes with surprising accuracy.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Word: I create documents that communicate effectively and look professional. Templates I've designed are used across organizations to maintain consistency and save time.
skillDescriptions.Business Strategy: I connect technological possibilities with business opportunities. I've helped teams plan digital transformations that align with long-term goals instead of chasing shiny new toys.
skillDescriptions.Project Management: I bring complex projects from idea to reality without losing sight of the people doing the work. I've led initiatives with moving deadlines and changing requirements while keeping teams motivated and focused.
skillDescriptions.Communication: I translate technical jargon into language everyone understands. I've bridged gaps between technical teams and business stakeholders to keep projects moving forward.
skillDescriptions.Leadership: I build environments where team members feel empowered to innovate and grow. My teams consistently deliver exceptional results because people know their contributions matter.
skillDescriptions.Product Management: I shepherd products through their lifecycle, balancing user needs with business realities. I've turned vague ideas into defined products that solved real user problems.
skillDescriptions.Business Development: I identify and pursue growth opportunities that create mutual value. I've established partnerships that opened new markets and revenue streams for organizations.
skillDescriptions.Science Communication: I make complex scientific ideas accessible without oversimplifying. I've explained cutting-edge concepts to diverse audiences in ways that generate excitement rather than confusion.
skillDescriptions.History: I explore the past to understand our present and future. Historical patterns provide incredible context for current events and technology trends.
skillDescriptions.SQL: I speak the language of databases fluently, writing queries that extract precisely the information needed. I've optimized queries that went from taking hours to seconds.
skillDescriptions.Marketing: I create compelling stories that connect products with people who need them. I've developed messaging that resonates on an emotional level beyond feature lists.
skillDescriptions.Economics: I analyze how resources flow and decisions are made. I've applied economic principles to pricing strategies and market analyses that drove business success.
skillDescriptions.Politics: I navigate the human systems that govern how decisions are made in organizations. Understanding political dynamics has helped me implement changes that might otherwise have stalled.
